div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo Septimo die mensis
Januarij Anno Domini et ceterea quingentesimo Quinto

The said day the Alderman Baillies Counsaill and communite warnit be the hand hell
gatherit ande be the officiaris of the said burgh' Inquerit / grantit and geff to sere thomas
byrne chaplane and sangstar thar perpetuale chapellanry of Sanct michaellis Alter for ale
the dais of his lyve wacand' be the deceis' of vmquhile maister Androu Craufurd'
et cetera ffor the quhilk chapellanry the said ser thomas oblist hyme to mak continuale residence
within the paris' kirk of Abirdene and keip obserue and sustene personaly ale devyne seruice
in synging within the said kirk and queyr at matynis evinsang compleing singin mess' and
all vthir devine seruice Ande Instruk teicht and furnys barnis and studentis in musyk to the
supportatioun' of goddis seruice at ale his power for ale the dais of his lyve And' forthir to do
devyne seruice at the said alter eftir the tenour of the fundacioun' of the samyn ffor the fulfilling
of the quhilkis the said ser thomas oblist him be the faitht of his body the gret aitht
suorne but fraud' or gill And' atour the saidis Alderman baillies counsall and communite
grantit to the said wer thomas Ilkane tua yeris ane burges wortht tua markis for
his gud seruice to be continewit in the said kirk

The said' day the aldirman ballieis Counsale and' communite gathtreit be premunicion'
of the hand' bell and the officiaris of the said' borghe' for the vphaldin of dyvine seruice
to the plesour' of gode the glorious' virgine mary Sanct nicholes thar patrone
conducit hyrit ande feit sere Androw Coupar chaplane ande Sangstar to mak personale residence
ande continuale seruice within thar' parys kirk and queyr' of the Samyne at mess' ma
tutynis evinsangis Completoriis and ale vthir dyvine seruice at organis and vthirwais
at ale his pouer' for ale the days of his lyve as he has done tymes bigane
and bettir gif he cane ffor the quhilkis the saidez aldirman balyeis Counsale and
communite has grauntit and assignit to the said ser Androw ane annuat pension' of tene
pundis sex Schillingis and viij d' for ale the dais of his lyve for his gude seruice
to be done as said' Is tharof aucht merkis of the malys of thar vuyr mylne
and fyve pundis of thar Rud' malys yerlie Ilkane yer' Nochtwithtstanding quhat
tyme It sale happin' the aldirman balyeis Counsale and communite to promoiwe the
saide ser Androw tile ony perpetuale chaplanry or seruice within the said' kirk or
burghe Thane It salbe lesum to thame to appropir' and tak to thar avne vys'
alsmekile of the said' annuat pensione as the valour' of the said' Chaplanry sale
happin tile extend' to Ande the said ser Androw oblist him be the fatht of his body
the gret aithte Suorne to obserue and keip ale pontis befor writin at his
gudlie pouer' Induring his lywe tyme but fraude or gile And'
tile help to teche Instruk ande Informe Sangstaris and barnis'
to the helping Ande forthiring of goddis seruice vpone the quhilkis
thai ordanit to ger mak ane lettir vndir thar common' seile to the
saide ser Androw

head.add: exoneracio Johannis ruthirfurd' de patronatu altaris beati michaelis

div.p:
The saide day comperit ser Jonhne ruthirfurd knicht befor the aldirman
balyeis Counsale and Communite being within the tolbutht of the Samyn
Ande thar' for certane Resonabile caus' concerning him frelie purlie
and Simplie one his avne fre wile and motiwe nocht choactit compellit
Constrenyeit nor' Circumuenit resignit the patronage of Sancte
michaelis altar fundit within the parys' kirk of the said burghe in the
handis of gilbert menyeis aldirman in the tovnis nayme Ande ale Richt
and clayme of richt propirte ande possessioun' quhilkis he hed' or mycht
ony wys' haue in and to the saide patronage with the pertinence for him his
ayris executoris ande assignez' he quietclamit and dischargit now and for euire
Ande gaf the samyne patronage frelie fra him his ayris and Assignez' to
the said' hale toune aldirman balyeis Counsale and Communite be ane gluff
Perpetualie with thame and thar Successoris to Remane

The said' day the aldirmane ballieis Counsale and Communite warnit
be the hand bell ande Officiaris throw the haile towne gatht
reit within the tolbutht Ande Circualy Inquerit One thar fre motyve
ande wile thar availe in that part Considerit and vndirstandin frelie and
opinly dischergit exonerat ande quietclamit thai Richt hartlie louet
nychtbior' sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht his ayris executoris and assignez of ale and
Sindry gudis comptis clamys and debatis that euire the said' knicht hed'
or Intromettit with or that euire he or thai may be follouit or clammyt
pertening to the said' toune for thame thar Successoris ayris executoris ande
assignez now and foreuir for his gret thankis and Sted' done to thame

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo die
mensis Januarij Anno quo supra

The said' day It was fundin be the ald' lovabile Consuetud' and Rite of the burghe
that in the honor of god' and the blissit virgin mary the craftismen' of the samyn in
thar' best aray kepit and decretit the processioun' one Candilmes' day yerlie
quhilkis alde and louabile consuetude the prouest ballieis and Counsale riplie auisit
Ratifi=eit ande appreuit the said' Rit Ande atour statut and ordanit that the saide craftis
men' and thar' Successouris Sale perpetualie In tyme to Cum to obserue and keipe
the saide processioun' als' honorabily as thai cane Ande thai sale in ordir' to the
offering in the play pas' tua and ij to giddir socialie In the first the flessouris
barbouris baxtaris Cordinaris skinnaris Couparis wrichtis to giddir hatmakaris and
bonatmakaris to gidder walcaris litstaris wobstaris tailyouris goldsmithtis blak
smithtis and hammirmen' And' thir craftismen sale furnys' thir pageantis / the cordonaris
the messing' wobstaris and walcaris Symeon' the Smythtis and goldsmithtis iij kingis
of cullane the litstaris the Emperour / the masonis' the thre knichtis the talyouris
our lady Sanct brid' and Sanct elene Ande the Skynneris the tua bischopis
Ande tua of Ilke Craft to pas' with the pageant that thai furnys to keip thar'
geir' And' gif ony persone or personis happinnis to failye and breik ony pont
befor writin and beis conuict tharof sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk
and the balyeis vnlaw vnforgevin Ande to the Obseruing and keping of the Samyn
ale the said' craftismen' was oblist be thar handis vphalding

The saide day Jonhne of mar forspekar for Androw gordon' and Anny strathachin his spous' g
said that vmquhile Williame buchane hed' nocht ane maser propir if his avne
bot he hed' ane liand' in wed' off Androw Ancroftis

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis continevit with consent of the partiis the actioun' debatable
betuix thomas buchan and Anny strathachin anent' the clame of ane maser and Ring
to the next lauchfule day eftir fastirevin Ande gif Johne of mar' Cumis fra the
monetht Ande Duncane Colison' happinis to be at hame Ande falyeing tharof to the
next lauchfule day thareftir' quhene the saidz Johne and Duncan beis batht present in siclik
forme and effect as It is now

The saide' day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit and assignit monunday the ix day of the
monetht of februar next to Cum to Williame Scherar litstar to Ansuer peremp
turlie to the borghe' fundin one him be Williame cheishame Ande the saide William
tile Ansuer peremptourlie to the borghe fundin one him be the said' William Scherar'
and Jonhne of Cullane his forspekar but ony dilatoris with Consent of batht the said'
partiis

The said' day Robert flessour fraser cordoner' grauntit that he hed' bocht fra the
relict of Williame ranisone four' dakir of hidis and iiijor od' oxin hidis and resauit
the samyn And' tuk to preiwe this day viij dais that he hed' pait hir'
for the said' hidis

Curia balliuorum Burgi de Abirdeine tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
februarij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo quinto

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cummis to Johnne Kennerty
to preiw that Johnne' malisoune sett to him the hous' quhilk he now Inhabitis
for his maill paying quhill the gud wif that aw the land' cum and' duell
in the samyne

The said day Dauy treis was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyeis
forspekar for Regratin agane the toune' in bying of skynnis and' to Amende
as law will and' forbeir in tyme to cum

The said day Dauy treis was conuict' be the said assis' for the vsing of skynner
craft in skaitht of the skynnaris and' to amend' as law will and'
forbeir in tyme tocum

Uniuersis Pateat Per presentes Nos Prepositum Balliuos Consules et communi
tatem burgi de Abirdene vnanimj consensu et assensu pro diuinj seruicij susten
tacione in honorem dei omnipotentis beatissime virginis marie beati nichaolaij et
omnij Sanctorum dedisse concessisse et hoc presenti scripto nostro confirmasse nostro dilecto
famuliari Capellano domino Andree Coupar musico vnam annuarij pensionem decem libra
rum sex solidorum et Octo denariorum vsualis monete scocie Inde annuatim leuandum octo
marcas de firmis nostri molendinj superiore Et quinque libras de firmis nostris burgalibus
particarum terrarum nostrarum ad duos anni terminos vsuales penticostes et Sanctj mar
tini in yeme per equales porciones pro toto tempore vite sue / pro suo fideli seruicio
in personali residencia infra ecclesiam nostram parrochialiem dictj burgj Impendendo faciendo
et continuando ad celebracionem matutinarum vesperarum completorij missarum ac alia
rum horarum quarumcumque tam in choro ecclesia quam ad organa prout in eisdem certis
temporibus elapsis perseuerauit Tenendo et habendam totam et integram dictam
annuam pensionem cum pertinencijs prefato domino Andree pro toto tempore vite sue
ac capiendum ad duos annj terminos ad manus proprias libere quiete plenarie inte
gre suie quocumque Inpedimento ffaciendo et cantando inde dictus dominus Andreas
diuina suffragia et seruicia in dictis choro et ecclesia solita et consueta prout alij
conductum cantores in huiusmodi ecclesia in diuinis astringuntur Non obstanti si contingat
nos aut Successores nostros prefatum dominum Andream ad quamcumque Capellaniam
perpetuam promeneris tunc licitum erit nobis partem dicte annue pensicionis ad
valorem prefate Capellanie ad versus nostros appropriare sue quocumque
obstaculo In Cuius Rej testimonium presentibus Sigillum nostrum communionem
et appensum Apud Abirdene vicesimo septimo die mensis Januarij
Anno Dominj Milleimo Quingentesimo Quinto et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio burgi de Abirdene Nono die mensis
februarij anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day xv dais to Dauid Kintor tile
Ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be William Watsone for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra him of ane Cow for ane meyr' bocht fra him perempturlie but ony dilatoris
with Consent of batht the said' partiis

The said' day Jonhne of meldrum oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to content and pay
to Androu meldrum ane half barrell of girls' Sufficient merchand' gude tane in the
wattiris of Done and Dee at the fest of Sanct Johne the baptist callit mydsommyr
nixt hereftir or within viij dais thareftir at the farrast for Redy money pait to him

The said' day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day xv dais to Jonhne malison'
to ansuer tile patry Red' anent the clame of ane tall of ane yerd' as law
will

The said' day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit and chargit Duncan smytht to deliuer the
masar' to the ayris of vmquhile Robert of Kintor betuix this and friday nixt
to Cum or eliis to Comper the said' day thar to her' the vale of the said' maser
preuit and to mak pament

The said' day the borghe' fundin one WIlliam scherar litstar be Williame cheishame
that the saide Williame scherar litstar aw to Releiwe him of Sex pundis of fraucht
quhilkis he pait for him to Willekin for his fraucht was fundin of nayn' avale
as yet becaus' it was strekin of mair' Some thane was aving be ane Suorne
assis' thomas leslie forspekar

The said' day the borghe' fundin be Williame scherar' litstar one Williame cheish
ayme for the wranguis' haldin fra him of thre barrellis of as' was fundin'
of nayn availe be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar And' atour it
was fundin be the said' assis' that he hed' done to the saide Williame scherar litstar
ale that he suld' do tile him anent the xxxvj barrellis of As'

The said day Williame blakhall conuict be ane suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar
for the forstalling of the burgh in bying of skynnis

The said day Duncan andersoun' wande was in ane amerciament of the court be his
avin toung grantit for the forstalling of the burgh' in bying of skynnis

The said day Androue portar adame Weir and Alexander burnat was accusit for
forstalling was continewit to monunday nixt tocum

The said day Duncan criste was in ane americament of the court be his avne
toung graunt for the forstalling of the burgh' in biing of skynnis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdenne' tenta in pretorio eiusdem Decimo die mensis
februarij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto

The said day the balyes chargit Dauid antoune to freith and Releiff sande lammyntone
of sevin schillingis iiijor d' within terme of lawe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Duodecimo
die mensis februarij Anno quo supra

The said day Donald baxtar stane oblist him be the faitht of his bodie to pay to mastir
Dauy menyes xv s' of annuall betuix this and Witsonday

The said day Dauy brois oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to pay to mastir Dauy
menyes fiften' s' betuix this ane pasche

The said day It was Deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thome of Waus forspekar that
William scrimgeor and' ormund' leslie sale pay to ser Johnne Ruthirfurd' xvij s'
tene d' of the Rest of ane hors' prisit and' sellit of the said' knichtis within
terme' of law

The said day the bailyes assignit this day xv dais to William scherar litstar
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin on him be William cheschame for the wranguis'
withthaldin fra him of iij pundis witht the mair to count and Raknyng'

The said day the court wardit schew for law and' It was gevin for dome
that thome Riddaill hed falyeit in his preiw anent xv s' of annuell
allegijt his pundis tane for the pament of the samyne of the land perte
nyng to Dauid colp tutor to Isabell buchane

The said day the balyes chargit Androw gordone to caus agnes strachin his
spous' to bring hir chartiris and' evidentis pertenyng to thome buchane befor
the aldirman and' counsall one monunday that nixt cumis that the said thomas
mycht haue thame that pertenis to him of Resone'

head.add: the wif of Will Raneson' fraser

div.p:
The said day it was preuit sufficiently that Robert fraser cordinar Is
awand' to the wif of Williame Ranesoun' tuenty nyn' schillingis
quhilkis the balyes chargit him to pay within terme of lawe for the
Rest of certane hidis bocht and Ressauit fra hir

The said day It was fundin be ane lauchfull Inquest that Duky philp
is nocht lauchfull air to vmquhill thome philp his fadir becaus thair Is
ane eldir bruthir levand' beyound the sey

The said day the balyes continewit the accusacionis of adam Weir Alexander por
burnat and' Androw portar was continuewit to monunday that nixt cumis
